description.value: The digital (virtual) Encounter is caracterized as an encounter that uses some technological mean to perform the encounter instead of a face-to-face meeting.

short.value: An digital/virtual interaction during which services are provided to the patient

definition.value:
The digital (virtual) Encounter is caracterized as an encounter that uses some technological mean to perform the encounter instead of a face-to-face meeting.
An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

comment.value: The use-case in question is performing a virtual encounter using a camera device to perform the encounter.

definition.value: A journal note to document the digital encounter.

Unique code or number identifying the Encounter
VKP project uses UUID.
Example: ~~~ "identifier": [ { "system":"urn:ietf:rfc:3986", "value":"urn:uuid:a76d9bbf-f293-4fb7-ad4c-2851cac77162" } ] ~~~

The actual uniqe identifier (UUID)
The portion of the identifier typically relevant to the user and which is unique within the context of the system.

short.value: The patient or group present at the encounter

definition.value:
Reference to the patient that is subject to the encounter, identified by Norwegian national id number (Fødselsnummer).
A link to a resource representing the person or the group to whom the medication will be given.
VKP always references a Patient Resource using a norwegian national id number (Fødslesnummer) in a logical identifier in the subject.identifier element. The Name of the patient should be given in the subject.display element.
Example: ~~~~ "subject":{ "identifier":{ "system":"urn:oid:2.16.578.1.12.4.1.4.1", "value":"05073500186" }, "display":"Ærlend Sørgård" } ~~~~

short.value: The official name of the HERid namespace

definition.value:
The official name of the HERid namespace, identified by its oid value
Establishes the namespace for the value - that is, a URL that describes a set values that are unique.

The HERid value identifying the participant
The portion of the identifier typically relevant to the user and which is unique within the context of the system.

Tha name of the individual
Plain text narrative that identifies the resource in addition to the resource reference.

short.value: The start and end time of the encounter/timestamp

definition.value:
Timestamp of when the encounter was finished, the system could provide both start and end times
Example code: ~~~ "period":{ "end":"2018-06-25T10:00:00.936+02:00" } ~~~
Reason the encounter takes place, coded according to http://ehelse.no/fhir/ValueSet/vkp-encounter-reason-v05
